author: USA TODAY, Kinfay Moroti, Special to USA TODAY Network
title: 'Afraid and overwhelmed': A look inside one hospital on the front lines of the coronavirus pandemic
description: In the war against coronavirus, doctors and nurses do battle not only against the virus but their own exhaustion. We go inside a Florida hospital to document these medical heroes.
content:
In the war against coronavirus, doctors and nurses do battle not only against the disease they battle exhaustion, too. 
Nurses meticulously take swabs at mobile testing sites and comfort those racked with fear. Doctors consult patients in triage tents via iP… [+4881 chars]
